title: VictorBah24
author: VictorBah24
created_time: August 24, 2023, 11:23:06 AMLast edit: August 25, 2023, 12:48:59 PM by VictorBah24
content: Business sale-Cannabis Seeds Bank in Eastern Europe.Annual turnover - 500 k euroSale for BTC. Business is 100% legal.Annual turnover - 500 k euroAnnual Profit - 200 - 250 K euro.More details in private Â We are a store that sells cannabis seeds and positions itself in the market as a seed bank with its own brand. All our processes are 100% legal. We operate within the framework of existing laws and our products are oriented to Eastern Europe. We accept orders all over Europe and beyond.In addition, you can place orders with us using one of the fastest shipping methods and with secure payment methods. We are superior to our competitors. We have contracts with the best courier companies, which allows us to complete orders on time and do not leave clients with unresolved problems.Why us?We have a respected and famous name in Eastern Europe. Cooperation with us opens up opportunities for you to receive the high quality of our products and services at any time of the year. And our company is growing year by year, as well as the quality of our products.We are planning our future for several years and are ready to share our knowledge, which will help to increase the company's profits at least twice.Everything about our brandOur business is made up of 4 online stores, 2 brands (seeds and CBD oil ). All our stores are built on the PrestaShop platform with a lot of customization. Very simple system for administration from a technical point of view.The business is run by a team of 7 people. But the majority of our processes are automated from a personnel and technical point of view. Currently, the business offers the possibility of remote administration, without local involvement. This allows you to move your business very easily to any country, city, office, warehouse, staff, etc.We are ready to invite you to become part of our brand. The cost of a business includes absolutely everything that the business owns (name, stores, personnel, warehouse, inventory, office, materials, etc.). The cost of a business can pay off in 4-5 years if you develop it on your own, or in 2-3 years if you apply our growth plan and cut costs correctly.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: VictorBah24 on August 24, 2023, 11:23:06 AMBusiness sale-Cannabis Seeds Bank in Eastern Europe.Annual turnover - 500 k euroSale for BTC. Business is 100% legal.Annual turnover - 500 k euroAnnual Profit - 200 - 250 K euroThis business sounds cool and okay. But I doubt if forum members will be confortable with the whole process as the OP account is pretty new and loads of trust level challenges are pertinent to newbie accounts.Involving people in this business will require more verifiable links and also a more concrete evidence of operations and tractions over time, the numbers in the operations is what investors are keen on without coming to private chat details with you.

comments.author: VictorBah24

But I doubt if forum members will be confortable with the whole process as the OP account is pretty new and loads of trust level challenges are pertinent to newbie accounts.Involving people in this business will require more verifiable links and also a more concrete evidence of operations and tractions over time, the numbers in the operations is what investors are keen on without coming to private chat details with you.Hello1. Our account is not for beginners, 2017 is not a very new year for Crypto.2. We have published the turnover, we cannot publish internal business documents here. We are waiting for you with a private message or even a meeting at our office for all the details that will interest potential investors.
